ruleset.name: Apex Structure Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex code structure and organization

rule.name: PreferSwitchOverIfElseChains
rule.message: Prefer switch statements over if-else chains when comparing the same value multiple times
rule.description: If-else chains with more than one else-if condition should use switch statements instead. This detects patterns like: if (x == 'a') {} else if (x == 'b') {} else if (x == 'c') {} The rule triggers when there are at least 2 else-if statements in the chain. Note: This rule currently only detects if-else-if chains, not sequential if statements.
